st:Description.name: E3DMigrationOptions
st:Description.st:role: Options to set while migrating data from V4 to V5
st:Description.st:detailedRole: Options to set while migrating data from V4 to V5

st:attribute.Name: Option
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Bundle segment can be migrated as a bundle segment OR multi-branchable document

st:enum.st:role: Migrate V4 BNSs to a V5 multi-branchable document. All the V4 BNSs of a given V4 GBN will result in a multi-branchable document: a single CATPart.
Migrate V4 BNSs to V5 bundle segments. Each V5 bundle segment will have its own CATPart document.

st:attribute.Name: GBNOptions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Geometrical bundle can be migrated as a component OR product document

st:enum.st:role: Migrate Geometrical bundle as a CATProduct.
Migrate Geometrical bundle as a component.
Migrate the Shells With Electrical Behavior.
